Html:
Hi,
I can´t update an entity with this type of parameter. In the serialize method, I don´t see this type in the Swith clause.
Anybody can help me?

Regards.

Hi.

TwoOptions is just true/false. You should be able to assign them directly and the toolkit will convert the values. You don't need to pass the TwoOptions type

Hope this helps.

Jaimie

Yes! Thanks.
We just discover that.
